name: Reynolds Cycling 27.5in. TR307 S Wheelset
description: Stiff, strong, light and fast to engage, these wheels will change how your bike rides for the better. The asymmetric carbon rims found on the TR S line allow even tension on either side to increase durability and ride quality. Slap your favourite tubeless tires on this 30mm rim and let your grin grow. The fast 5° freehub engagement is supported by 6-pawls to ensure you can navigate technical climbs and obstacles with confidence. No need to choose between a light wheelset that climbs or a stiff one that corners, the TR S line checks both boxes.Hookless tire bead that is tubeless ready for a burp-free tire fit and easy inflation.Rim uses the Reynolds MR5 construction technology.Asymmetric rim profile allows for even spoke tension to create a stiff and durable wheel.Rim depth of 26mm allows for a compliant ride.Internal width of 30mm and external width of 36mm plays nice with modern tires.28 spokes laced in a 3-cross pattern in the front and rear for durability.Boost hub spacing helps with stiffness and durability.Front hub uses a 15x110mm axle. Rear is 12x148mm.Reynolds TR6 mountain hubs features fast and smooth rolling bearings.5° of hub engagement uses a 6-pawl freehub design.XD driver is compatible with XD cassettes.Compatible with Centerlock rotors. Adapter included for 6-bolt rotors.
